Transfer Register (E-PRTR) Regulation mentions ‘spilling’ as a particular type of pollutant ‘release’
(Article 2 (10)). Article 5 (2) of E-PRTR Regulation specifies that operators have to ‘include
information on releases and transfers resulting as totals of all deliberate, accidental, routine and
non-routine activities.’
